name: Abies  nigra
Relationship: Compare: (Lump in stomach - China Bry. Puls.) also other Conifers - Thuja, Sabina, Cupressus (painful indigestion) also Nux-v. Kali-c.

Head: Hot, with flushed cheeks
Low-spirited
Dull during the day, wakeful at night
Unable to think
Fever: Alternate heat and cold; chronic intermittent fever, with pain in Stomach
Stomach: PAIN IN STOMACH ALWAYS COMES ON AFTER EATING

Sensation of a lump that hurts, AS IF A HARD-BOILED EGG HAD LODGED IN THE CARDIAC END OF STOMACH; continual distressing constriction just above the pit of the stomach, as if everything were knotted up
Total loss of appetite in morning, but great craving for food at noon and night
Back: Rheumatic pains and aching in bones
Wakeful and restless at night, with hunger
Chest: Painful sensation, as if something were lodged in the chest and had to be coughed up; lungs feel compressed
Worse coughing; water brash succeeds cough
Dyspnea; worse lying down: Sharp, cutting pain in heart; HEART'S ACTION HEAVY AND SLOW; TACHYCARDIA, bradycardia

details: A powerful and long-acting remedy, in various forms of disease, whenever the characteristic stomach symptoms are present. Most of the symptoms are associated with the gastric disturbances. IN DYSPEPTIC TROUBLES OF THE AGED, with functional heart symptoms; also after tea or tobacco. CONSTIPATION. Pain in external meatus.
